name: Cuvee
description: A collaboration from TGA Genetics and Aficionado Seeds, Cuvee was created crossing Space Queen and the clone-only Pinot Noir. This hybrid plant will hit you fast with a relaxing body high while you taste sweet cherries and chocolate. Rich flavor paired with copious amounts of resin makes Cuvee a great strain for making cannabis concentrates.
attributes_title: Euphoric, Relaxed, Uplifted, Happy, Giggly, Stress, Pain, Depression, Insomnia, Headaches, Anxious, Dry Mouth
